channel.title: Changing teles (Pimpscape)
channel.description: Hi, I'm using a Pimpscape souce. And in the normal teleports it says "Falador" I want to change that to "Pk Train" And make it tele you to "2554,3466". But i can't figure out how to change it.. ,Yeah.. I am a beginner coder. :(. And , someday hope to be a really good coder.

item.description:

tried it from scratch… this is just a practice server.

item.title: Changing teles (Pimpscape)
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Do not waste your time with pimpscape, i worked on my server for over a year and failed, to make it even slightly good you need to change the whole server, so you might as well start from scratch.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing teles (Pimpscape)
item.dc:creator: @Surfr Surfr
item.description:
@Surfr wrote:

For the first part of your question open up TextHandler.java and search for 1200 this will bring you to the top of the modern spellbook, scroll down until you find Falador, and change it to what you want.

And for the second part open up Client.java and search for case 4146: and below there change it to what you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing teles (Pimpscape)
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Uhmm i had the same problem. Try entering your client.java files.Done that yes? Next press Hold ctrl and press F
A small box should pop up with a text box you can wright in. Type in that text box Home or Pk or what ever you are
looking to replace just keep clicking find next until you find something like

code[/code] <<- something like that.

Once you get there, there will be something like

teleX=**** and teleY=****

But those * will be numbers. Once you see them put in the coords you want your tab to tele to.

Sorry thats all i could do. I shall try make some time to post some basic TUTORIALS on the tutorial section

Bye

Read full topic
